aircraft.value: Shadow Hunter - AC-3373-885 at Sector South Station

defect_observed.value: Inverter output voltage deviation. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.

root_cause.value: Foreign object damage to critical surface

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Generator Control component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications

preventive_action.value: Issue technical bulletin to all operators

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Technical evaluation completed. Proposed preventive measures are appropriate and align with design intent. Date: 30/01/2023 Authorized Signatory of Design: Eng. K.N. Iyer

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Quality aspects reviewed. Manufacturing process controls are adequate. Recommend supplier quality audit. Date: 02/02/2023 Signature: Sqn Ldr A.R. Desai

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User perspective considered. Recommend update to operating procedures based on lessons learned. Date: 31/01/2023 Signature: Dr. S.M. Kulkarni

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) Quality aspects from regulatory perspective reviewed. Investigation methodology is comprehensive and acceptable. Date: 06/02/2023 Signature: Dr. A.K. Sharma

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Airworthiness implications assessed. Recommend issuance of technical directive for fleet-wide compliance. Date: 08/02/2023 Signature: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

Centre for Military Airworthiness and Certification
FORM - 44
DEFECT INVESTIGATION REPORT FORMAT
Part - III: (Defect Details)
a) Defect Category: Minor
b) Defect Observed: Inverter output voltage deviation. Anomaly detected during routine inspection.
Part IV: Investigation: (Details of Examination including previous similar Defects)
a) Root Cause Analysis: Foreign object damage to critical surface
b) Findings / Conclusions: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Generator Control component. Testing
confirmed performance below acceptable limits.
c) Remedial Measures Adjust calibration settings to manufacturer specifications
i. Corrective Action:
ii. Preventive Action: Issue technical bulletin to all operators
d) Attributable Code: N1 - Defect confirmed but reason not established
